Reset.description: This action is used to reset all systems hosted on this Baseboard.
Reset.longDescription: This action shall perform a reset of all systems hosted on this Baseboard.  For systems which implement APCI Power Button functionality, the PushPowerButton value shall perform or emulate an ACPI Power Button push.  The ForceOff value shall remove power from the system or perform an ACPI Power Button Override (commonly known as a 4-second hold of the Power Button).  The ForceRestart value shall perform a ForceOff action followed by a On action.
